subject: OFFTOPIC -- testing systems that generate emails
msgSnippet: Hello, all, sorry to stray from the topic at hand, but.... I m a java developer that has somehow ended up teaching a VB.NET class (gasp). Anyway, I m having my
messageBody:
Hello, all, sorry to stray from the topic at hand, but....

I'm a java developer that has somehow ended up teaching a VB.NET class
(gasp).
Anyway, I'm having my class write an open-source application that tests
systems that generate emails.
The program will store expected results (detailed lists of emails) and
compare those to the actual results
(list of emails culled from inboxes). So, this is more of an
integration test tool than a unit test tool.

I was curious if there is anyone out there who would like to contribute
to the requirements
or perhaps could point me to existing, comparable products (from which
we could steal requirements).
Email me directly at eostermueller@....

Thanks,

--Erik Ostermueller
